title: Flexit Cafe and Bakery
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Soups, sandwiches, salads, and baked goods place. Vegan choices include a banh mi sandwich with tofu, a hummus wrap, quinoa salad, couscous salad, and super greens salad. Salads have the option of having seared tempeh added. Four soups daily with at least one vegan. Fresh juice bar, smoothies with choice of almond milk or soy milk.
